question: Can we pray in our university prayer room with the noise of the chapel going on below us ?
answer:
QUESTION
Dear Mufti Sahib. The prayer room in our uni is directly above the college chapel and when they play their organ music it is very loud and obviously a distraction during salaat. Is it permissible for us to pray in this room. Jazakallah Khairoun.
ANSWER


Share:
If there is no alternative, then one will be excused for performing Salaat in the referred prayer room.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
